posts.caption: It definitely feels good to be back! Much LOVE & RESPECT to everyone out there!

We are the most complex creatures that God has ever created. Everything in this universe was created to serve US. Don’t let anyone tell you that you can’t achieve your dreams! Don’t let anyone put you down! Haters always gonna hate! posts.caption: Growing up as an obese kid and almost always being last in every race hit my self esteem very hard. I benefitted nothing from my lame excuses. I didn’t give up though! I made sure this changes and worked hard at it day-in and day-out. Crossing the 131 kg mark (almost 290 lbs.) made it seem impossible, but nothing was going to stop me. Discipline, commitment, dedication and a complete lifestyle overhaul was the solution to my problem. The struggle ended when the gratitude began. Shedding 45 kg (about 100 lbs.) was the result. I can’t be more grateful for this life changing experience. And always remember that when things don’t happen right away, just say to yourself that it takes 6 months to build a Rolls Royce and only 13 hours to build a Toyota. Good things come to those who wait. Just don’t stop until you’re proud! THE BODY ACHIEVES WHAT THE MIND BELIEVES... #ExerciseTime #Trainiac #FitnessJunkie #FitFam #InstaFitness #FitFam #Fitness #Fitspo #Fitporation #FitForLife #FitLifestyle #FitJourney #FitnessForLife #FitGoals #FitInspiration #WorkoutTime #HomeWorkout #WorkoutAtHome #NoShortcuts #HomeFitness #FitTips #FitFun #HandleIt #ExerciseTime #ExerciseForLife #FitnessPartners #FitnessGoal #FitnessGuru #FitnessBody #FitnessFirst

The truth is that the more intimately you know someone, the more clearly you'll see their flaws. That's just the way it is! This is why marriages fail, why children are abandoned, why friendships don't last. You might think you love someone until you see the way they act when they're out of money or under pressure or hungry! Love is something different. Love is choosing to serve someone and be with someone in spite of their filthy heart. Love is patient and kind. Love is deliberate! Love is hard, love is pain and sacrifice, it's seeing the darkness in another person and defying the impulse to jump ship... For the love of God show your loved ones that you truly care about them, for every moment that passes by without expressing this feeling is a lost opportunity. We have taken the value of time for granted, although it's the most valuable resource we possess. May God clear your vision and help you realize the amount of blessings you have. Just being able to breathe is the biggest blessing on its own. Believe in the power of love, believe in the power of God, for without them life is truly meaningless.

Time is our most valuable and irreplaceable resource and yet we tend to take it for granted. Anyone that personally knows me will tell you how angry I get when people are not on time. “A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.” #inspirational #motivation #inspiration #motivational #motivationalquotes #quotes #love #success #inspirationalquotes #inspire #entrepreneur #quote #follow #quoteoftheday #hustle #business #life #like #inspiring #positivity #entrepreneurship #wisdom #quotestoliveby #lifestyle #quotesaboutlife #successquotes #positivevibes #positive

Your future is created by what you do today, NOT tomorrow... Never underestimate the power of your mind... Go for whatever you want to become right now!

The most important kind of freedom is to be what you really are. You trade in your reality for a role. You trade in your sense for an act. You give up your ability to feel, and in exchange, put on a mask. There can't be any large-scale revolution until there's a personal revolution, on an individual level. It's got to happen inside first. Wake up people, life is short so make sure that every second that passes you are being true to yourself, as God has created everyone of us in the most unique way possible. Accept yourself. #quotes #motivational #love #inspirationalquotes #motivationalquotes #inspire #life #success #quote #quoteoftheday #entrepreneur #positivevibes #quotestoliveby #successquotes #instagood #hustle #motivationalquote #business #happiness #entrepreneurship #fitness #positivity #poetry #inspirationalquote #wisdom #lifequotes
